string-array.name: tortoise_and_hare
string-array.item: Once upon a time there was a slow tortoise and a speedy hare
Hare liked to brag about his fast feet and Tortoise was tired of hearing him boast
and so one day, Tortoise challenged Hare to a race
All their animal friends came to watch and Tortoise and Hare were off!
Hare zoomed down the road and he called back to Tortoise
"How will you win when you move so so slow?" before he laughed and sprinted away
Hare ran and ran and he was so far ahead that he thought to himself "I have time for a nap"
so he hid behind a bush at the side of the road and drifted off to sleep
All the while, Tortoise walked and walked
he never ever stopped and soon, he had reached the finish line!
all his animal friends cheered, yelling so loud that they woke Hare from his sleep
Hare hurried back to the race track, but it was too late
Tortoise had won! And so Hare learned a lesson that day
"Don't brag about your lightning pace, for slow and steady wins the race"
